website_summaries.verdict: Whether you are fond of running-inspired sneaker or a vintage-designed kick, the Saucony Jazz Original Camo is a great option. Like the original Saucony Jazz, this fashionable sneaker also has an eye-catching aesthetic that is versatile enough to be worn with everyday outfits. It is not only comfortable, but its quality is also consistent with the other time-tested sneakers from the brand. Given its affordable price, purchasers need not think twice before copping this Saucony Jazz model.
pros: Numerous wearers are happy with how the Saucony Jazz Original Camo met their expectations
This sneaker is described as “very comfortable” by many
The quality of this shoe is excellent and consistent with the other sneakers from Saucony, according to several reviewers
A lot of consumers agree that this kick pairs well with many different outfits
Many of those who own a pair of the Camo iteration of the Saucony Jazz Original admire its stylish design
Some buyers are not hesitant to get multiple pairs of this shoe
A few users praise the support they get from the Saucony Jazz Original Camo shoes
Plenty of purchasers say that the price of this shoe is within their budget
This sneaker comes in a wide array of color choices
cons: A couple of users mention that this shoe feels a bit tight in the toe box area

customer_reviews.title: Nice Style
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good! Saucony are cheap/good shoes if you pay them max $40.... if you pay more..... no way choose another brand! Only problem for me was the fit... too small.. I usually buy saucony original 9.5 and they fit perfectly... this pair instead fit too small! Buy half size up
customer_reviews.author: Satyr

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I believe these shoes are an excellent buy, considering the price. Quality looks top-notch, fit comfortably and the looks are excellent. You'd never know they're budget shoes. If there was just 1 grievance, if its even that, is that I wish the tongue was a little more thicker, but really.....nothing at all to complain about. I used a bought insole to help with my walking. Almost all shoes, now days, lack quality or comfort in this area, I swear (At least if you're slightly heavier). But since I have a over-pronation walk, and am hard on shoes, these definitely deliver, with extra insoles used
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. Light. Arch support not great. Good value
customer_reviews.text: I used to love the Jazz many many (35) years ago when it was a true running shoe. These are no longer running shoes but I bought them half out of nostalgia to use for walking. For the $40 I paid, I am satisfied. The arch support is adequate, though not awesome. May be flat for some. They are on the firmer side despite their appearance. They have a soft lining so you can go sockless if you were so inclined. The fit was as I expected. I wear a 9 medium street shoe and 91/2 athletic shoe most of the time. I ordered the 91/2 med here and the fit was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable sneakers I have ever owned and I wear them exclusively. They are lightweight yet offer excellent support. The soles are flared slightly which is great for balance. They breath great and dry off when wet without any shrinking. When they get dirty I remove the innersoles, tie the laces and throw them both in the washer and dryer. They come out fresh and clean and this is how I can keep a pair for many years. The soles do wear over time but they are still wearable and the tops never break down or fray. Most importantly they have classic styling and go with any outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Leahy

customer_reviews.title: Usually these shoes are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love Saucony Jazz shoes. These ones looked awesome but had to return them. There was something with the way the trim fit together that pressed really awkwardly on the top of my foot and made the shoes unwearable for any length of time. I tried to wear them in for about 3 days and couldn’t wear them for more than 30-60 minutes without having to take them off. This is odd because normally these shoes are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Hamburger

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: Counterfeit. Super cheap quality. They look cool, but they feel like KMART blue light special and the stitching on the tongue is laughable. Returned. Should have known better when I saw that the box was different. Only one set of laces too. Will add photos later.
customer_reviews.author: BungeeDad

customer_reviews.title: Throwback temptation
customer_reviews.text: Haven't worn yet. Got to wear w/summer outfits and had this style in several colors in my younger days. The trim comes off a bit more grey than white to me. But otherwise as I remember them from back-in-the-day. Price was real good. My only concern is how flimsy/cheap the tongue looks which gives me some pause about true authenticity.
customer_reviews.author: R. McIntire

customer_reviews.title: Not the same blue shoes as the pictures
customer_reviews.text: The pictures show navy blue shoes with yellow stripes but the shoes I got are light teal blue. I checked the Saucony website and they have both color options available so basically the listing is messed up. edit: It appears amazon has updated the listing since this review.
customer_reviews.author: zd

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes and receive a lot of compliments on them. They're comfortable and they last a long time, especially considering the price. This particular pair only included one pair of laces which is odd. Saucony said they should have a second pair in a contrasting color. The seller credited a pair of laces for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anastacia Beaverhausen

customer_reviews.title: Major Foot Problems
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to buy these sneakers b/c I have wide feet, plantar fasciitis, & work overnight in a hospital setting. But, when I tell you these are the most supportive, sneaker I've worn to work thus far! They're not heavy like Hokas or Brooks. I need these in my life. I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Look / fit / comfort are great. But the mesh/net part is not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Love nearly everything about the look and fit of these. However, the mesh/netting part below the toe already has a hole in it after just a couple (2-3) months. I've had this problem with other pairs of Saucony sneakers before as well and it is getting to the point where I may abandon the brand despite them being super comfortable and looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Classic fire
customer_reviews.text: I wear exclusively Saucony sneakers for over 15 years now. I have these in every wild colorway I can find. They are super comfortable and light weight. I use a suede protectant spray to help them last a bit longer. I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Potato_w/_Jive

customer_reviews.title: my fav running shoes were jazz I had in 80s Glad they still make them
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting to get this color in my size as i had shoes with the same in the 70s. my fav running shoes were jazz I had in 80s Glad they still make them.Yes I do run in these with added 2oz miricle insoles.No problems.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jepson

customer_reviews.title: Love my Sauconys
customer_reviews.text: I’m a woman and I bought these because hey. They’re cute. I get compliments Every time I wear them. Super comfortable for daily wear, but even better for hiking.
customer_reviews.author: GPRGRL

customer_reviews.title: Love’em
customer_reviews.text: Might be my favorite pair of sneakers at the moment. Got these in all the colors. Super comfy and quality is on point!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Talk about stylish! The shoes are head-turners. They are also very comfortable for walking and running. I would recommend the shoes even if you're not into running due to the look alone!
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: Smaller and bit lower quality than the 20+ year old version
customer_reviews.text: Toe area width 3/8" smaller (measured at sole) and tongue not as padded. Quite a bit tighter fit in toe area, but buying next size up is a much longer shoe - so hopefully will widen with age. Otherwise nice stitching, breathable front mesh and removable insole - almost up to the true original (which was made in China, this is from Vietnam).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: One of my most comfortable pair of shoes. Can stand all day with comfort. Really can’t beat the comfort and quality of Saucony for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Finlay

customer_reviews.title: Best buy ever
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mines brought this shoes and he loves it he love so much he wants another one in it jus a different colour
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes.they look awesome.the lighter blue is much brighter than I expected.but I still love these.definitely buy these if you want a great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No arch support.
customer_reviews.text: Materials are really cheap, but it wasn't expensive. Old fashioned design, fairly high heel, soft footbed. I added arch support insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. Fit just right. I love the color, and it goes well with many outfits. Saucony is the only brand I can get and know it will fit. These last a long time too.
customer_reviews.author: applecart2

customer_reviews.title: Will up yo game
customer_reviews.text: I wear these 2x a week standing up all day cashiering. Compliments still coming in!
customer_reviews.author: Jameson Moore

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves them
customer_reviews.text: The sneaker is comfortable and the brand Saucony has been a win for my son who is very picky with footwear. The brand that fits your feet comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Miss Nightmare!

customer_reviews.title: I'll be getting more.
customer_reviews.text: I started walking 2 miles to/from work each day to add some exercise to my daily routine. I had been wearing some generic Nike running shoes that are sort of my "do it all" shoe, but not great for walking that much daily. I recently ordered and received these Saucony's and they have been an immediate upgrade. I have less pain at the end of the day in my knees and heels and the walks have been much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Gillund

customer_reviews.title: Men shoes seem to b more comfortable for me
customer_reviews.text: Ilove sauconys . Me being a size 10 in woman show I always get a size 8 or 8 1/2 in men shoes.. I prefer men show better
customer_reviews.author: 💪♀

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Fits slightly small in the type area.
customer_reviews.text: I'd order one-two half sizes up for best comfort in the toe area. Your true size might feel a little tight. It's not unbearable at all just more comfortable with room to wiggle. Overall very cushy. Color and style is top notch. I replaced the white strings with tan.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bryson

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Definitely fakes, been wearing them for a week and the glue is already coming undone
customer_reviews.author: Steve James Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Comfort comes first!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a gift to my boyfriend. He loves these shoes and wanted another pair. They fit him exactly as expected, theyre super comfortable and now his new everyday shoes he wears to work!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect casual sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a casual sneaker for short walks and these are perfect. They are light weight but they have a nice sole. The colors are great and you really can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea B.

customer_reviews.title: Niiiiice!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pair of sneakers! Fit well, look great. Cant beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Baja_Nene

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: It says the material is leather. However, it’s a textile. Runs 1 size smaller. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitri

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe perfect out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoes! Can't beat Saucony Jazz - comfy and very light!
customer_reviews.author: Ace the Hoot

customer_reviews.title: Nice light weight summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe for the price. Its not a heavy weight shoe very light. I like the thin tongue and the breathable toe covering. A nice summer shoe.
customer_reviews.author: SoCoFish the neighborhood DIY Dad

customer_reviews.title: Factory imperfection at the stitching
customer_reviews.text: Came brand new with a pretty severe snag at the stitching that has begun to unravel even more after wearing just two times.
customer_reviews.author: psl124

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: very nice looking. very light. make ur feet look smaller
customer_reviews.author: Kenbola

customer_reviews.title: ... with the quality and the manufacture of this product super happy excellent
customer_reviews.text: surprised with the quality and the manufacture of this product super happy excellent service
customer_reviews.author: AP/ALEX

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be quite well constructed time will tail
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J Connell

customer_reviews.title: Too small, for casual use i prefer size up
customer_reviews.text: It was too small comparing to other models, actually i wear casual shoes 10, but in this case i prefer 1 full size up
customer_reviews.author: დათო

customer_reviews.title: Women’s shoes
customer_reviews.text: These showed up and our women’s shoes. Smaller than men’s sizes and say women’s on the tag. Huge bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: fresh to death
customer_reviews.text: love these shoes!!! i get so many compliments when i wear them
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Garcia

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I always buy this shoe because I like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: mcoss

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: They feel really light.. not as sturdy as I thought.. but overall for the price it's an O.K . Sneaker
customer_reviews.author: franklin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers and even better looks than in the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Mark Goode

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are comfortable. Feel light on your feet when you walk in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The criss cross
customer_reviews.text: The box and tag say 11, BUT sneakers are 10 1/2
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good experience. Thanks.
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors! Light weight! Wish they were delivered faster. Wish they were not out of my size.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter Langenbacher

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are so uncomfortable. There is no arch support and my feet were sore from walking all day in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This makes my 6th pair of retro sauconys! Love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very much satisfied !
customer_reviews.text: My favorite design so far ! I like the fit and price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Ayodele

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for old school !
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was nice the pink was a bit darker than the photo but over all I like it💕
customer_reviews.author: kimyata

customer_reviews.title: Very light and wider than average shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were wider than average. Which is good for me, but not so wide that they're uncomfortable for more narrow feet
customer_reviews.author: Josh Woodall

customer_reviews.title: Great after breaking in
customer_reviews.text: Used as work shoes after 1-2 weeks they broke in
customer_reviews.author: bj p.

customer_reviews.title: Good selection
customer_reviews.text: There are some of the best shoes I’ve ever gotten
customer_reviews.author: Gregory McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Always love the Saucony, both jazz originals and low profile.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Quinn

product_meta.title: Saucony Men's Jazz Original Vintage Trainers
product_meta.description: Vintage running sneaker with breathbake mesh and suede upper
feature_bullets: Lace up with padded collar and tongue
Foot bed with shock absorption, fit and extra comfort
